Package graph

Interface Graph

public interface Graph

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    says if all the vertexes are interconnected

    says if the vertexes are interconnected

    int nbOfVertices()
    Returns the number of vertices in the graph.

      v2 - the second vertex
